extendedInfo.description: Discover the highlights of the Mercedes-Benz model series using the "Mercedes-Benz Guides" app. Use the app to call up Guides specific to the model series with information, films and animations. You can access the Owner's Manual for various models quickly and easily. Everything from explanations of vehicle features in film form to important tips regarding a breakdown, and let's not forget the practical keyword search; you'll find everything worth knowing here. Content is available both online and offline. Current information about the Guides, such as new model series and updates, for example, can be found under "News". In case of more in-depth problems or questions, please visit "To the developer's website".Content of the GuidesBreakdown assistanceHere you will find troubleshooting information. Furthermore, the Mercedes-Benz Service Hotline is available to you at the press of a button.Quick startsGet a brief overview of how to use your vehicle. The most important controls, functions and support information are summarised for you here.Visual searchDiscover the desired information by selecting the corresponding hotspots from the 360Â° image of the vehicle and its interior.Owner's ManualsIn the "Owner's Manual" section, you can obtain detailed information on your vehicle, COMAND Online or the Audio 20 system, as well as Bluetooth connectivity for mobile phones. The indexed keyword search takes you quickly to the information you need.BookmarksUse bookmarks for fast access to your favourite content within the Mercedes-Benz Guides app. Topics that are used often can thus be called up with a single click.Search functionYou can obtain required information quickly using the comprehensive search function.

reviews.title: It was good, now a waste of space on my tablet.
reviews.comment: Well, it was good, now only data on the S Class; shame I only have a humble B Class. Hey ho - back to the paper as I checked the \'update\' bottom. Who said, \'it it ain\'t broke, don\'t fix it?\'
reviews.author: Antony Harrison

reviews.title: No C class?
reviews.comment: I was excited to have this app on my phone but I don\'t see anything for the c class on this app. Correct me if I\'m missing something, but as the owner of a c300, I feel left out. Will change score once this has been updated.
reviews.author: Nik Donovic

reviews.title: Good app, improving content
reviews.comment: App concept is good. It was initially lacking in content, but has improved continuously albeit slowly. Because of these, it does not include every single Mercedes-Benz out there. For those included, I find it very useful.
reviews.author: Gerardo Alzugaray

reviews.title: Ok for passenger cars.
reviews.comment: I have an ML.... No guides here for the ML. Terrible app.
reviews.author: Thomas Jose

reviews.title: Where have the guides gone?
reviews.comment: Nothing but an S-class guide since the update, where have the A- class and other guides gone? This app is now useless to me.
reviews.author: Steve Owen

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: Where\'s cls and m class? ?!
reviews.author: Abid Ayub

reviews.title: No c Class
reviews.comment: Where is the c-class.??
reviews.author: Tinashe Kanyoli

reviews.title: No SL class
reviews.comment: No guide for the SL class. No use to me. Uninstalling.
reviews.author: Patrick Kays

reviews.title: S class only
reviews.comment: Nothing but S class.
reviews.author: Alexander Koutev

reviews.title: Gut aber ...
reviews.comment: Nach dem Update ist nur noch die neue S Klasse verf\303\274gbar. Vorher war die A, B und E Klasse noch dabei. Wo sind die nun? Tablet users should be aware that: If you already have one or more of the current Guides (A-Class, B-Class, CLA-Class, E-Class and Citan) and would like to continue using these, we would advise you not to update the app on your tablet, even if you receive a message to this effect. Only carry out an update when these Guides are also available as native tablet versions.
reviews.author: David Serembe

reviews.title: Rubbish
reviews.comment: Where have  all the models  gone. Only have the s class now. Very useful as I have an A class. The pre update version was working just fine.
reviews.author: Sally Cohen

reviews.title: Do Not Update
reviews.comment: WTF. Where have all the guides gone? Do not update.
reviews.author: Luke Stracey

reviews.title: I <3 Mercedes
reviews.comment: I <3 Mercedes
reviews.author: Ahmed Shalaby

reviews.title: Not good.
reviews.comment: This app only has 2 styles of Mercedes vehicles. Useless.
reviews.author: Irina Smith

reviews.title: Only Class A and B
reviews.comment: Poor poor app don\'t bother unless you have an a class or b which I don\'t think they even make in America. I thought this was murica\'
reviews.author: Sergio Lopez

reviews.title: Only A & B options
reviews.comment: Not much use to most Mercedes owners who have c, s or m class cars...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Worthless
reviews.comment: What a shame.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs updating fast
reviews.comment: Again with a previous comment, when will we get an update with the models that most people have, C,E,ML and S classes
reviews.author: mandeep singh

reviews.title: Not all classes
reviews.comment: Only coverage for the A and B class cars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good presentation, limited selection.
reviews.comment: Nice setup, but only includes the A and B class.... Would like to see a more complete selection of vehicles.
reviews.author: A Google User
